Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is ribbed, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and very faint traces of at least three lines of Coptic (?) text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393431) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393431)
